gov.nist.csd.pm.common.model.prohibitions

Interface ProhibitionsDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemProhibitionsDAO, Neo4jProhibitionsDAO, ProhibitionsPAP, ProhibitionsService, SQLProhibitionsDAO

    public interface ProhibitionsDAO
    Interface to maintain Prohibitions for an NGAC environment. This interface is in the common package because the Prohibition service in the PDP will also implement this interface as well as any implementations in the PAP.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Create a new prohibition.

      Retrieve a Prohibition and return the Object representing it.

        Prohibition getProhibition(java.lang.String prohibitionName)
                    throws PMException
        Retrieve a Prohibition and return the Object representing it.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • updateProhibition

        void updateProhibition(Prohibition prohibition)
                throws PMException
        Update the given prohibition. The name of the prohibition is provided in the parameter.
        Parameters:
        prohibition - The prohibition to update.
        Throws:
        PMException

      • deleteProhibition

                throws PMException
        Delete the prohibition, and remove it from the data structure.
        Parameters:
        prohibitionName - The name of the prohibition to delete.
        Throws:
        PMException
